text: Palau (Lu Palau) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2019, 4,187 people lived there. Its area is 44.44 kmÂ². It is 5 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Palau, Sardinia
